examples: fulsome bird life. The feeder overcrowded

definition: generous in amount, extent, or spirit
examples: the passengers were fulsome in praise of the plane's crew
a fulsome victory for the far left
the greetings have been fulsome, the farewells tender
she was in generally fulsome, limpid voice
the devil take thee for a … fulsome rogue

definition: exceeding the bounds of good taste : overdone
examples: the fulsome chromium glitter of the escalators dominating the central hall
an admiration whose extent I did not express, lest I be thought fulsome
